api_list.name: times
api_list.description: Returns times according to city ID

required_parameters.name: cityId
required_parameters.description: City ID in All Location service

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://prayer-times-api1.p.rapidapi.com/getTimes/4892"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "prayer-times-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://prayer-times-api1.p.rapidapi.com/getTimes/{cityid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "prayer-times-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
